date-of-birth.header: What is your date of birth?

upload-british-passport.label: Upload a file
upload-british-passport.hint: Your file must be JPEG, PDF or PNG and be 25MB or less
upload-british-passport.paragraph1: Attach an image of your British passport as proof of your identity. the image must be
upload-british-passport.link-text: signed by your countersignatory (opens in a new tab).

upload-passport.p1: Attach an image of your passport from the EU, Switzerland, Norway, Iceland or Liechtenstein as proof of your identity. The image must be
upload-passport.link-text: signed by your countersignatory (opens in a new tab)
upload-passport.file-format: Your file must be JPEG, PDF or PNG, and be 25MB or less

upload-driving-licence.p1: Attach an image of your driving licence photocard as proof of your identity. The image must be
upload-driving-licence.link-text: signed by your countersignatory (opens in a new tab)
upload-driving-licence.file-format: Your file must be JPEG, PDF or PNG, and be 25MB or less

upload-proof-address.p1: You need to scan and attach 2 documents as proof of your home address. The documents must be dated within the last 3 months and
upload-proof-address.p2: The first document must be one of the following:
upload-proof-address.p3: The second document must be one of the following:
upload-proof-address.p2-li3: utilities bill (including energy, water, internet or phone bills)
upload-proof-address.link-text: signed by your countersignatory (opens in a new tab)
upload-proof-address.file-format: Your file must be JPEG, PDF or PNG, and be 25MB or less

upload-certificate-conduct.label: Upload a file
upload-certificate-conduct.hint: Your file must be JPG, JPEG, PDF or PNG and be 25MB or less
upload-certificate-conduct.paragraph1: A certificate of good conduct is issued by the police in your country of nationality. It shows if you have a criminal record and details of any offences.
upload-certificate-conduct.paragraph2: Attach an image of your certificate of good conduct. The image must be
upload-certificate-conduct.link-text: signed by your countersignatory (opens in a new tab).

birth-certificate.header: Your countersignatory must be your parent or guardian
birth-certificate.p1: You told us you are under 18. Your countersignatory must be your parent or legal guardian.
birth-certificate.p2: To prove this relationship, upload a countersigned copy of your birth certificate or other legal document.
birth-certificate.file-format: Your file must be JPEG, PDF or PNG, and be 25MB or less

change-home-address.p1: You must change your address if you have moved home since your current licence was issued.
change-home-address.p2: Storage or usage address can be amended later under the substances section.

amend-licence.p1: You can only use this form to amend these details on your licence:
amend-licence.p2: If you need to make any other changes to your licence, email the Explosives Precursors and Poisons Licensing Unit at
amend-licence.listElement3: substances - including if your storage or usage address has changed

select-poisons.p1: Tell us which poisons you want to import acquire use or possess.
select-poisons.p2: If you need multiple poisons, you can add each one separately.

your-name.header: What is your name on the licence?

must-report-theft.header: You must report the theft to the police
must-report-theft.p1: If you want to apply for a replacement licence, you need to report the theft to the police. They will provide you with a crime reference number, which you must use to complete this form.

countersignatory-details.description: Your countersignatory must not be a parent or relative, unless you are under 18. If you are under 18, your countersignatory must be your parent or legal guardian.

declaration.p1l1: that the answers I give on this form are true to the best of my knowledge and belief
declaration.p1l2: to provide additional information if it is reasonable and necessary to determine my suitability
declaration.p2l1: knowingly making false representation on this form may constitute an offence under the Fraud Act 2006
declaration.p2l2: the details I have provided will be checked against databases to assess my suitability to hold a licence
declaration.p2l3: my details will be held electronically and processed in accordance with the Data Protection Act 2018

payment-problem.header: Sorry, there was a problem during payment
payment-problem.p1: Your account has not been charged.
payment-problem.p2: If you keep having problems when paying, contact us at

payment-cancelled.p1: You cancelled the payment. Your account has not been charged.
payment-cancelled.p2: Your answers will be saved for 30 minutes. You can
payment-cancelled.p3: and pay for your licence in this time.
payment-cancelled.p4: After 30 minutes, your answers will be deleted and you will have to enter them again.

payment-failed.fraud-check: the payment failed fraud checks with your bank account
payment-failed.3d-authentication: you need to approve a 3D Secure authentication first
payment-failed.insufficient-funds: there are insufficient funds in the account
payment-failed.p3: If you keep having problems when paying, contact us at

replace-application-submitted.p1: We have sent a receipt and confirmation of your application to {{values.replace-email}}
replace-application-submitted.licence-damaged: If your licence was damaged, you must return it
replace-application-submitted.p2: There are instructions on how to return your licence in your confirmation email.
replace-application-submitted.p3: After we receive your old licence, we will begin the replacement process.
replace-application-submitted.licence-stolen-lost: If your licence was lost, stolen or destroyed
replace-application-submitted.p4: You do not need to do anything unless we contact you.
replace-application-submitted.p5: We may email you for more information. Check your spam or junk folder to make sure you do not miss anything.
replace-application-submitted.make-change-application: If you need to make changes to your application
replace-application-submitted.p6: If you need to make changes to your replacement application or have any questions, contact

change-substances.paragraph1: You must amend the substances on your licence if you:
change-substances.listElement1: need to add or remove substances you can acquire, possess or use
change-substances.listElement2: need to change the concentration or volume of substances that your licence covers
change-substances.listElement3: have changed your storage or usage address since your current licence was issued

select-precursor.p1: Tell us which explosives precursors you want to import acquire use or possess.
select-precursor.p2: If you need multiple explosives precursors, you can add each one separately.

explosives-precursors.p1: Check what your licence needs to cover using the
explosives-precursors.link-text: list of regulated chemicals (opens in a new tab)
explosives-precursors.p2: You do not need a licence for reportable explosives precursors.

no-precursors-or-poisons.header: The explosives precursors and poisons on your licence will not change
no-precursors-or-poisons.paragraph1: You told us you do not need to amend the explosives precursors or poisons on your current licence. This includes the storage or usage address for the substances.

poisons.p1: Check what your licence needs to cover using the
poisons.link-text: list of regulated chemicals (opens in a new tab)
poisons.p2: You do not need a licence for reportable poisons.

confirm.subheader: Review your answers below and amend if required before proceeding to declaration and payment.

replace-regulated-explosives-precursors.label: Does your licence need to cover explosives precursors?

replace-is-details-changed.label: Have any of your details changed since the licence was issued?

replace-police-report.label: Have you reported the theft to the police?

replace-countersignatory-years.label: How many years have you known countersignatory?

why-need-poison.label: For what purpose do you need this regulated substance?

how-much-poison.label: How much do you wish to acquire?

what-concentration-poison.label: What concentration % w/w of the substance do you need for your intended purpose?

why-need-precursor.label: For what purpose do you need this regulated substance?

how-much-precursor.label: How much do you wish to acquire?

what-concentration-precursor.label: What concentration % w/w of the substance do you need for your intended purpose?
